text: "Sussudio" is a 1985 song by Phil Collins and was released in January, 1985. It is the opening track from his third studio album No Jacket Required. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 3 in the Netherlands, number 8 in Australia and Spain, number 10 in Canada, number 12 in the United Kingdom, number 13 in Finland and number 17 in Germany. ==Track listings== 7-inch: Virgin / VS736 (UK) # "Sussudio" # "The Man with the Horn" 7-inch: Atlantic / 7-89560 (US) # "Sussudio" # "I Like the Way" 12-inch: Virgin / VS736-12 (UK) # "Sussudio" (extended remix) # "Sussudio" # "The Man with the Horn" CD: WEA International / WPCR 2065 (Japan) # "Sussudio" # "Sussudio" (extended mix) ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Phil Collins songs Category:Funk songs
title: Sussudio
